main event: A witness observed a round light object in Reeder, North Dakota on February 28, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as round and about the size of a grapefruit held at arm's length., The object appeared in the west, traveled northwest, and disappeared over the horizon., The object changed color from red to orange to pale yellowish white as it rotated., The sighting lasted approximately 20 to 30 seconds., The witness reported that there was no sound associated with the object.
witness description: A male farmer aged 35 who was with his wife at the time of the sighting.
